# Issue #038: Monitoring and Observability

**Phase:** Phase 4 - Scale & Governance  
**Weeks:** 27-28  
**Component:** Full-stack  
**Estimated Effort:** 5 days  
**Priority:** High  
**Labels:** phase-4, monitoring, observability, devops

## Description
Implement comprehensive monitoring and observability including frontend error tracking, performance monitoring, user analytics, backend tracing, audit logging, and alerting system.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Frontend error tracking (Sentry or similar)
- [ ] Performance monitoring (Core Web Vitals)
- [ ] User analytics (behavior tracking)
- [ ] Backend distributed tracing
- [ ] Structured logging
- [ ] Audit logging for all actions
- [ ] Alerting system for critical errors
- [ ] Dashboard for system health
- [ ] Custom metrics and KPIs
- [ ] Log aggregation

## Metrics to Track
- Error rates
- API response times
- Page load times
- User engagement
- Feature usage
- System resource utilization
- Cache hit rates
- Database query performance

## Dependencies
- Depends on: All components

## Deliverables
- Error tracking integration
- Monitoring dashboards
- Alerting configuration
- Documentation
